name: QuickSetCloud
0:
”Alexa, turn on my lights”
”Alexa, open the blinds”
”Alexa, set the temperature to 70 degrees”
skdetail:
Smart Home Skill. This skill may share device information with Amazon. Learn more.
Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content.
Developer Terms of Use
des:
You can now use Amazon Alexa with your Nevo Butler for a complete smart home experience!

QuickSet enables you to instantly discover, control, and interact with existing entertainment and smart home devices. Connect to thousands of Works with QuickSet devices, including thermostats, lights, shades, switches, plugs, door locks, and sensors, and use your voice to control them through the QuickSet Cloud skill.

Turn your lights on, or even increase your room temperature using simple voice commands.

Try saying:

"Alexa, turn on lights"

"Alexa, dim the lights to 10%"

"Alexa, set lights to blue"

"Alexa, decrease the temperature"

"Alexa, set the temperature to 70 degrees"

"Alexa, lock the door"
